cast.overview: A lonely boy desperately searches for guidance and protection, when he finds a completely unconventional mentor hiding in the nearby woods.
cast.title: The Wise Guy

cast.overview: When fate brings Belfast teacher JJ into the orbit of self-confessed "low life scum" Naoise and Liam Óg, the needle drops on a hip-hop act like no other. Rapping in their native Irish, they lead a movement to save their mother tongue.
cast.title: Kneecap

cast.overview: Wayne, an ex-con, wants to turn his life around by applying for a salesman job. The only thing is, he needs a suit. With the aid of his friend he steals a distinctive, bespoke suit from the corpse of a wealthy man, not realising that the woman interviewing him for the job is the dead man's daughter.
cast.title: The Suit

cast.overview: A comedy about a schoolboy with a strange friend seeking romantic advice from his granddad who in return wants him to break him out of his mental institution.
cast.title: Take It From Me
